name: DELIVERY_PRES
description: This table contains the presentation types of the newborn. These are choices selected in Stork's Delivery Summary activity, and are populated in the delivery record. This information is also copied to the OB_EPT_BH_PRES table in the baby's Patient (EPT) record.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEL_PRESENTATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category value for the newborn presentation type during birth. This information is stored in the Delivery Record.
